description:
A simple crew sweater in bamboo fleece made like nothing else.

This pullover raglan sweater is a must-have for every tall guy's closet. The midweight bamboo and lycra blend keeps it breathable and makes it and ideal staple year round. You're going to love its sharp design and clean fit.
name: Navas Lab Apparel Billy - 2020 Crew LS Fleece - Mens
